channel.title: ARM [WARN] Received http status code 404 ("Not found") from server '1.1.1.1'
channel.description:
My whonix gateway works fine as i understand, but sometimes i get this error in arm.
[WARN] Received http status code 404 ("Not found") from server '1.1.1.1' while fetching "/tor/keys/fp/*********/"
Is it bad ?

item.title: ARM [WARN] Received http status code 404 ("Not found") from server '1.1.1.1'
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not very bad. Because arm is conceptually not a tool to detect anything bad such as leaks. It’s a Tor controller, so it has a very different purpose and cannot find out about “bad” things.

I don’t know what specifically could cause this, but there are a lot other confusing messages by arm, which are documented here:

Whonix – 12 Dec 19

Control and Monitor Tor

Using a Tor Controller with Whonix ™. onioncircuits. Nyx. Vidalia. View or Change your Tor circuits. Monitor Tor and inspect logs.

Read full topic
item.source: ARM [WARN] Received http status code 404 ("Not found") from server '1.1.1.1'
